title: lucks001
author: lucks001
content: Da Vinci Locker Team is offering 15K USD Worth $DVL Tokens, through this Bounty Program. This Bounty Campaign will start on the 03/05/2022 and proceed till the 27/05/2022.GoldenAgeCoin https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1510486PROMOTING A Project that does not exactly exit all links or websites are not exit http://Also, Their Website Warn About Safety Website - https://prnt.sc/2nbfsmqzMpV7Twitter - https://prnt.sc/6W5StJWIdiI7Youtube - https://prnt.sc/Yf3oz4IlPhCrMedium - https://prnt.sc/iXOWcU8aWCKpcheck their all thing https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5397072.0

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: lucks001 on May 11, 2022, 01:56:14 PMAlso, Their Website Warn About Safety It's about a security certificate, not a serious matter but it certainly shows that amateurism is behind it all.their website davincislocker.io doesn't seem to work anymore (with http or even https) and without any deeper research, everything stinks of scam there. whatever bounty bots still post reports in the thread.Is it user GoldenAge Coin (bounty thread opener) part of "Da Vinci Locker" or is just a campaign manager? should be warned.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: The site is not accessible anymore but there are still reports from their bounty campaign, these are bots that just don't care if the project is a scam or not, the bounty manager should lock the bounty thread or he will get the blame for not taking action, bounty manager should be quick to take action when there are reports like this, to save his reputation and the bounty hunters' time and effort.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: lucks001 on May 11, 2022, 01:56:14 PMAlso, Their Website Warn About Safety Website - https://prnt.sc/2nbfsmqzMpV7Twitter - https://prnt.sc/6W5StJWIdiI7Youtube - https://prnt.sc/Yf3oz4IlPhCrMedium - https://prnt.sc/iXOWcU8aWCKpcheck their all thing https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5397072.0yes, I saw it and I tried to open the Youtube, Telegram, Medium and others links, it doesn't work, for me the Da Vinci Locker project is a scam.Oddly enough: @GoldenAge Coin, gave no warning to his participants and he continued to promote the project.Looks like you should alert the community in their campaign thread directly and point to this topic, simultaneously PM the manager and point it here, I want to see, what the manager has to say.
